arts.ttl: Liga MX Review: Atlas Stage Stunning Comeback at Tijuana
arts.sum: John Kennedy joined Los Tuzos from Fluminese in January and scored his eighth goal in 11 games to salvage a point after Mazatlán took a lead early in the second half. Óscar Macias' second goal in as many games was enough to send the home side up to 15th, but remain six points away from Chivas in the final playoff position.
